mapper.select: SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS count, -- 状态名称映射（根据实际业务状态值调整） CASE WHEN status = 0 THEN '待审核' WHEN status = 1 THEN '审核中' WHEN status = 2 THEN '已通过' ELSE '其他状态' END AS statusName FROM t_contract WHERE owner_id = #{managerId} -- 关联当前登录用户 GROUP BY status
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_contract WHERE DATE(create_time) = #{date}
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM t_contract WHERE DATE(create_time) = #{date}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_contract WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() AND status = 2 AND owner_id = #{managerId} AND delete_flag = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_contract WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() AND status = 3 AND owner_id = #{managerId} AND delete_flag = 0
